mapper.sql: PERMIT_ID , PERMIT_NAME , PERMIT_CODE , PERMIT_VALUE , PERMIT_DESC , ORDER_FLAG , RESERVE1 , RESERVE2 , RESERVE3 , RESERVE4 , RESERVE5 , ADD_USER_ID , ADD_USER_NAME , ADD_TIME , MODIFY_USER_ID , MODIFY_USER_NAME , MODIFY_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from SYS_PERMIT
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into SYS_PERMIT
PERMIT_ID,
PERMIT_NAME,
PERMIT_CODE,
PERMIT_VALUE,
PERMIT_DESC,
ORDER_FLAG,
RESERVE1,
RESERVE2,

MODIFY_TIME,

mapper.update:
update SYS_PERMIT
PERMIT_ID = #{record.permitId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PERMIT_NAME = #{record.permitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERMIT_CODE = #{record.permitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERMIT_VALUE = #{record.permitValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERMIT_DESC = #{record.permitDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_FLAG = #{record.orderFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RESERVE1 = #{record.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE2 = #{record.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE3 = #{record.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE4 = #{record.reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE5 = #{record.reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADD_USER_ID = #{record.addUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADD_USER_NAME = #{record.addUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADD_TIME = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_USER_ID = #{record.modifyUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MODIFY_USER_NAME = #{record.modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update SYS_PERMIT
PERMIT_ID = #{permitId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PERMIT_NAME = #{permitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERMIT_CODE = #{permitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERMIT_VALUE = #{permitValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERMIT_DESC = #{permitDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_FLAG = #{orderFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADD_USER_ID = #{addUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADD_USER_NAME = #{addUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_USER_ID = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MODIFY_USER_NAME = #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where PERMIT_ID = #{permitId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
